rolls.name: Rolls
rolls.details: These items will add extra rolls to your account and will be automatically assigned upon purchase.

upgraders.name: Upgraders
upgraders.description: Add some stars to your card!
upgraders.details: To enhance the rarity of your card, purchase the upgraders! The "Target" attribute specifies the rarity it can be applied to, while the "Effect" indicates the resulting rarity.

auction-bells.name: Auction Bells
auction-bells.description: Trade your cards in the Auction House!
auction-bells.details: Auction Bells are utilized to create offers and auctions within the Auction House. The "Days" attribute specifies the duration of the offer or auction being created.

roll-tickets.name: Roll Tickets
roll-tickets.description: Roll a card of a guaranteed rarity!
roll-tickets.details: Tickets allow you to roll without consuming your regular rolls, ensuring that the resulting card will possess the rarity specified in the attributes.

wish-granters.name: Wish Granters
wish-granters.details: Granters allow you to wish for a specific character, increasing the frequency of cards featuring that character. You can keep track of your current wishes using the command {command:wishlist}.

gifts.name: Gifts
gifts.description: Raise the affection of your cards!
gifts.details: Looking to strengthen the bond with someone special? Consider buying them a thoughtful gift! However, keep in mind that not every gift will be appreciated by everyone. Be selective and choose wisely to avoid any potential negative consequences.

energy-drinks.name: Energy Drinks
energy-drinks.details: Energy drinks restore the energy required for dating, helping you stay charged and charismatic during romantic encounters. Each drink restores a different amount of energy, indicated by the "Energy" attribute.

souls.name: Souls
souls.description: Change the personalities of your cards!
souls.details: Unhappy with your card's current personality? Transform it with the essence of these enchanting souls!

miscellaneous.name: Miscellaneous
miscellaneous.description: An array of useful miscellaneous items!
miscellaneous.details: These items may not fit into the other categories, but their utility remains unquestionable nonetheless!
